pullRequest.title: NoteEditor: Fix newlines when previewing
pullRequest.bodyText:
Purpose / Description When saving a note, we convert a newline to
We should do the same for Previewing Fixes Fixes #6834 Fixes #6460 Approach Convert newline to
How Has This Been Tested? Tested on my phone - now shows as it would in reviewer. Learning Trivial fix, probably was a misstep to let it through as a defect, as defects are rarely looked back at. Checklist You have not changed whitespace unnecessarily (it makes diffs hard to read) You have a descriptive commit message with a short title (first line, max 50 chars). Your code follows the style of the project (e.g. never omit braces in if statements) You have commented your code, particularly in hard-to-understand areas You have performed a self-review of your own code

commit.message:

NF: Add NonNull annotation
